title: GPC Pins
description: A digital platform for selling e-vouchers, event tickets, prepaid units, and related digital products. The system integrates secure online payment, instant code delivery, and user-friendly product browsing. It enhances convenience for customers while providing an easy-to-manage backend for administrators.

title: Bamfo Herbal Center
description: A professional website for Bamfo Herbal Centre, a Ghanaian herbal clinic specializing in natural remedies for conditions such as hepatitis B, typhoid, and diabetes. The platform features service listings, a virtual herbal store, and a contact system, enabling patients to learn about herbal treatments and connect with the clinic easily.

title: Vincere Consult
description: A modern website designed for Vincere Consult, a reputable law firm in Ghana. The project highlights their core legal services, attorney profiles, practice areas, and contact channels. It incorporates a professional, trust-building design with responsive layouts and accessibility in mind, enabling clients to easily access information and request consultations online.
dataAiHint: Law firm website showcasing legal services and professional profiles.

title: Kumawu Technical Institute
description: An academic website built for Kumawu Technical Institute, a leading technical and vocational education and training (TVET) institution in Ghana. The platform includes academic programmes, admission guidelines, news updates, events, and an alumni page. It offers a structured and accessible experience for prospective students, parents, and alumni while maintaining an institutional look and feel.
dataAiHint: Technical institute website with academic programmes and admissions information.

title: Panacea Home Health Care
description: A responsive website built for Panacea Home Health Care, a service provider delivering quality health care at home. The platform showcases services like elderly care, post-surgery support, and home nursing, with a booking system for clients to request appointments. The design emphasizes empathy, trust, and user-friendliness for families seeking reliable healthcare solutions.
dataAiHint: Healthcare website with booking system for home care services.

title: Frebbys School Portal
description: A school management system designed for efficient administration of student data, academic records, class schedules, and fee management. The system supports authentication, role-based access (admin, teacher, student, parent), and reporting, providing a digital solution for modern educational institutions.

title: Sikadua Cocoa
description: A comprehensive management system developed for cocoa purchasing processes. It streamlines operations such as farmer registration, cocoa purchases, payments, and reporting. The system provides dashboards for managers to track transactions, generate financial reports, and ensure accountability in the cocoa value chain.

title: Think and Act Sales Inventory
description: A sales inventory management system designed for Think and Act Enterprise. It enables tracking of products, sales transactions, stock levels, and customer information. The platform provides dashboards for monitoring inventory, generating sales reports, and ensuring efficient business operations.
